Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #include <ros/ros.h>
2 #include "unicorn_cmd_interface/unicorn_cmd_inteface.h"
3 
4 int main(int argc, char **argv)
5 {
6  ros::WallDuration timeoutDur(5);
7  ros::master::setRetryTimeout(timeoutDur);
8  ros::init(argc, argv, "unicorn_cmd_interface");
9  ros::NodeHandle n_;
10  UNICORNCmdInterface cmd_interface(n_);
11  ros::Rate rate(1);
12  int choice, commandStatus;
13  Command cmd;
14 
15  cmd_interface.displayUserInterface();
16  while (true)
17  {
18  choice = cmd_interface.getUserInput();
19  if (choice > -1)
20  {
21  cmd = cmd_interface.processUserInput(choice);
22  }
23  if (cmd.state > -1)
24  {
25  commandStatus = cmd_interface.sendUNICORNCommand(cmd);
26  if(commandStatus == -1)
27  {
28  ROS_INFO("%d", commandStatus);
29  ROS_INFO("[Unicorn User Interface] Exiting command node.");
30  return -1;
31  }
32  cmd.state = -1;
33  choice = -1;
34  }
35  ros::spinOnce();
36  rate.sleep();
37  }
38  return -1;
39 }
40 
41 UNICORNCmdInterface::UNICORNCmdInterface(ros::NodeHandle node)
42 {
43  n_ = node;
44  unicorn_cmd_pub_ = n_.advertise<unicorn_cmd_interface::command>("commands", 0);
45  unicorn_web_cmd_sub_ = n_.subscribe("web_commands", 0, &UNICORNCmdInterface::webCommandCallback, this);
46  unicorn_state_sub_ = n_.subscribe("TX2_unicorn_state", 0, &UNICORNCmdInterface::stateUpdateCallback, this);
47 }

49 UNICORNCmdInterface::~UNICORNCmdInterface()
50 {
51 }

53 void UNICORNCmdInterface::displayUserInterface()
54 {
55  std::cout << "------------------- UNICORN CLI -------------------" << std::endl
56  << "1: IDLE mode 2: Send Goal 3: Activate LIFT 4: Align with bin 5: Reverse to bin 6: Print current state" << std::endl
57  << "H: Pause execution" << std::endl;
58  return;
59 }
60 
61 int UNICORNCmdInterface::getUserInput()
62 {
63  static struct termios oldt, newt;
64  tcgetattr(STDIN_FILENO, &oldt); // save old settings
65  newt = oldt;
66  newt.c_lflag &= ~(ICANON); // disable buffering
67  newt.c_cc[VMIN] = 0;
68  newt.c_cc[VTIME] = 0;
69  tcsetattr(STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &newt); // apply new settings
70 
71  int c = getchar(); // read character (non-blocking)
72  if(c == '\n' || c == '\r' || c == '\0')
73  return -1;
74  tcsetattr(STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &oldt); // restore old settings
75  return c;
76 }
77 
78 Command UNICORNCmdInterface::setGoalCommand()
79 {
80  system("clear");
81  Command newGoalCmd;
82  newGoalCmd.state = STATE_NAVIGATING;
83  std::cout << "<-- Please enter goal coordinates -->" << std::endl;
84  std::cout << "X:";
85  std::cin >> newGoalCmd.param1;
86  std::cout << std::endl << "Y:";
87  std::cin >> newGoalCmd.param2;
88  std::cout << std::endl << "Yaw:";
89  std::cin >> newGoalCmd.param3;
90  std::cin.clear();
91  std::cin.ignore(INT_MAX, '\n');
92  return newGoalCmd;
93 }
94 
95 Command UNICORNCmdInterface::processUserInput(int choice)
96 {
97  Command cmd;
98  switch (choice)
99  {
100  case '1':
101  cmd.state = STATE_IDLE;
102  break;
103 
104  case '2':
105  cmd = setGoalCommand();
106  break;
107 
108  case '3':
109  cmd.state = STATE_LIFT;
110  break;
111 
112  case '4':
113  cmd.state = STATE_ALIGNING;
114  break;
115 
116  case '5':
117  cmd.state = STATE_REVERSING;
118  break;
119 
120  case 'H':
121  system("clear");
122  ROS_INFO("[Unicorn Command Interface] Exiting...");
123  exit(EXIT_SUCCESS);
124  break;
125 
126  default:
127  ROS_WARN("[Unicorn Command Interface] Invalid input");
128  displayUserInterface();
129  break;
130  }
131  //system("clear");
132 
133  return cmd;
134 }
135 
136 int UNICORNCmdInterface::sendUNICORNCommand(Command cmd)
137 {
138  unicorn_cmd_interface::command msg;
139  ros::Rate(0.5);
140  msg.state = cmd.state;
141  msg.param1 = cmd.param1;
142  msg.param2 = cmd.param2;
143  msg.param3 = cmd.param3;
144  for (size_t i = 0; i < 3 && !(ros::master::check()); i++)
145  {
146  if(i == 2)
147  {
148  ROS_ERROR("[Unicorn Command Interface] Could not reach ROS master command not published");
149  return -1;
150  }
151  }
152  unicorn_cmd_pub_.publish(msg);
153  ROS_INFO("[Unicorn Command Interface] Published new command");
154  displayUserInterface();
155  return 0;
156 }

162  std::cout << unicorn_cmd.state << std::endl;
163 
164  // sendUNICORNCommand(unicorn_cmd);
165 }

167 Command UNICORNCmdInterface::parseWebCommand(std::string web_cmd)
168 {
169  Command parsed_cmd;
170  auto cmd_obj = json::parse(web_cmd);
171  std::cout << cmd_obj["command"] << std::endl
172  << cmd_obj["payload"] << std::endl;
173  return parsed_cmd;
174 }
